entities.name: dumbledore's army
entities.description: The group is named by its members as 'Dumbledore's Army' in a parchment, indicating their allegiance to Dumbledore.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as the one who scribbled the heading on the parchment months before.

entities.name: fudge
entities.description: Fudge is mentioned as the one who is surprised by Dumbledore's Army and does not understand what is going on.

entities.name: cornelius fudge
entities.description: Cornelius Fudge is mentioned as the Minister of Magic.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned but does not understand what is going on.

entities.name: mcgonagall
entities.description: McGonagall is mentioned as looking at Kingsley with fear in her face.

entities.name: kingsley
entities.description: Kingsley is mentioned as looking at McGonagall with fear in his face.

relationships.description: Dumbledore's Army has been named by its members, and Fudge is aware of this name.
Hermione created the parchment with the heading 'Dumbledore's Army'.
Dumbledore confronted Fudge about Dumbledore's Army.
